name: Untitled Tomb Runner
description:
Untitled Tomb Runner

A game originally intended for the Ludum Dare 50 jam with the theme "the end is inevitable".

Enter the tomb and discover its secrets.
Be careful though. No one knows what is inside.... since everyone who went in did not come back..
-----------------------
Objective:
-> Get as far as possible and compare your prowess with previous challengers. Every puzzle must be confirmed by pressing the button at the door.

Movement -> WASD
Interaction -> E
Drop Item -> G
-----------------------
Main Development Team

Ibrahim Oezhan - Programming
Edgar Canelas - Audio Design and Implementation
-----------------------
Assets Used

Sandstone Textures - 4K
Rock Textures - 4K
Desert Kits 64 Sample

Music
Deskant - Searching Through Sand
Deskant - As the Rivers Collapse
